body.name: SPICE BY TIA MOWRY 3.5 QT Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven W/Embossed Lid - Honey Gold (87075.02R)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the SPICE BY TIA MOWRY Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 56 mins
features: WHAT'S IN THE BOX: one 3.5-quart Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven with Lid
ONE-POT WONDER:Crafted from cast iron for even heat retention and distribution. Perfect for one-pot and oven-to-table recipes
GLOSSY ENAMEL FINISH: Durable enamel finish is easy to clean, while smooth interior resists stains from acidic ingredients like tomato sauce
SELF-BASTING LID: Interior of the lid contains grooves to redirect moisture back on the food, while the exterior features a stainless steel knob and unique embossed patterns
WIDE HANDLES: For a balanced and comfortable grip when lifting and serving
body.description: A one-pot wonder, the SPICE BY TIA MOWRY Savory Saffron 3.5-Quart Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven in Honey Gold shines in any kitchen. Crafted from cast iron for the ultimate in even heat retention, it’s finished in a durable enamel. The lid features embossed patterns for an extra pop of stovetop style. Easy to clean with no need to season, it’s perfect for simmering, boiling, sautéing, frying, baking and more. Oven safe up to 500°F. Handwash only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty Dutch oven
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only used it once so far but it’s going to be among my favorites. It distributes heat evenly and it’s easy to hand wash but heavy as cast iron is. I love the color; it can be left on the stove to brighten up the area. I’m glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great product I would recommend- but the paint chipped!
reviews.reviewText: I have been eyeing Dutch Ovens for about a year, maybe 2. Like pretty much everyone else, I ogle over Le Creusets and their beauty out of the cabinets on everyone else’s stoves. The warmth and colors- and of course the mouthwatering food they produce. I couldn’t justify the expense, and most of the other brands either didn’t fit my style, or had a knob I knew I would have to replace for use in the oven… then I saw this one.The color, quality, pattern and lack of a brand on the top really set it apart from the other off brands available. The turquoise color and lid design match our eclectic Southwestern decor seamlessly. The price was perfect for what I’m willing to spend right now. So even with my lack of knowledge on the Spice brand- the small 20+ amount of 5 star reviews convinced me this was a purchase I could take a risk on.Boy does this baby cook! I have an Always Pan and an Instant Pot that I do most of my cooking in- the real downside is that neither of those can go in the oven. Even with the crisp attachment on the instant pot- I never get that dreamy bubbling crust I crave from cheesy casserole dishes- and I really hate using multiple pots and pans for 1 meal especially on a weeknight. This is the solution! I can do EVERYTHING in this pot and then put it in the oven. The first thing I made was a chicken broccoli bake- and even though my photo isn’t the prettiest to look at- it was TASTY! Evenly cooked all the way through, with a beautiful cheesy crust. Yum! We have a roommate at the moment who isn’t always home at the same time- even an hour and a half after taking it out of stove it was still warm for him!***UPDATE***Cooked a whole chicken and Brussels Sprouts dinner in 1 pot! The chicken was PERFECT! I think I’ll skip doing whole chickens in the instant pot and just use this 😋😋I’m a super happy satisfied camper. I will be buying these as gifts at this price for weddings and holidays! I don’t even think I’ll register for a Le Creuset after this! I’ve never personally cooked with the one- but I really can’t see there being a huge difference with how even this cooked.I can’t wait to make bread, braise, make soups, pot roast, deep fry…. Etc!Would highly recommend to anyone! The quality is exceptional and the value for money is on point!***UPDATED AFTER USE OVER A MONTH OR 2***This Dutch oven has been an every other day use item since I got it. I do love it- the food is phenomenal. However the paint is starting to wear and chip on the outside. It doesn’t really bother me. The product still performs. I won’t change the star on it unless the inner white enamel starts to chip.I’m very pleased with food that has come out of it- just did a 4 lb pork shoulder inside on a weekday! I still leave it on the stove- even with the chips. It hasn’t been dropped or washed any harder than a heavy cast iron pan would be. I consider myself to be pretty strong in terms of holding it up- but haven’t had to really scrub it.I bought the turquoise one- which chipped maybe a month or 2 after I bought it.I would still recommend this product… just might not buy it for someone else… or pass it down. I will be registering for the luxury French pot when the time comes 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy pot
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a well-performing Dutch oven pot but didn't want to spend the $ for a Le Creuset or Staub. Consumer reports rated this one highly so I got it. I've used it a couple of times for sourdough bread and simmering beans and soups. Excellent performance and it's very attractive too. It seems that it would last a lifetime as long as it's well cared for. It is heavy and solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mowery Dutch ovenP
reviews.reviewText: It is everything I would hope it would be comes clean like a dream and cooks wonderfully
I was disappointed with the colour which is much darker than the pictures. Not very pretty.
